497860.name: Zezenia Online
497860.description:
Zezenia Online is a free to play medieval 2D MMORPG inspired by the classics. Choose from one of three main classes: Warrior, Ranger or Mage and ascend to one of seven subclasses with distinct talents. Take part in intense skill based PvP wars to prove your worth or hunt over a hundred different monsters in non-PvP areas.



Team up and access 10+ unique dungeons with one to five players and loot special rewards. Complete over 100+ quests to discover the lore of Nyrathia and other continents of the world. Form a guild with other players to dominate or protect the realm.



Dropped items in Zezenia are dynamic with a random tier assigned from Ordinary to Epic to Legendary. The attributes of the item are randomized, making every piece of equipment unique. The possibilities are endless! And to take the rarest equipment even further, Enchanting can be used to improve their attributes.



Other notable features include an unlockable Bestiary, Dungeons, Gathering & Brewing, Pets, player Houses, Monster & Boss Kill Tasks, Timed Raids, Ingame Market, Guilds, Colosseum Arena, a biweekly Castle War, Soccer, PvP Arenas and more. Discover Zezenia Online's unique perspective on the free to play MMORPG for yourself!

Online and built from scratch since 2008, Zezenia Online has three game worlds: the new entrant Zera with non-PvP & PvP Enforced areas & the classic juggernauts of Elysium and Pharos with non-PvP and PvP respectively.
